data_table.description: The UPenn NGS sample attributes table contains the NGS quality metrics obtained after processing the samples through the NGS pipeline.

variable.name: SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: De-identified Sample ID

variable.name: NGS_Protocol_FileName
variable.description: Document that details the NGS processing pipeline applied to the SCAP-T samples

variable.name: HumanGenomeAssembly
variable.description: Human Genome assembly used

variable.name: GencodeVersion
variable.description: Gencode version

variable.name: PennSCAP-T_pipeline_version
variable.description: Version of the Penn SCAP-T pipeline

variable.name: STAR_version
variable.description: STAR version used

variable.name: HTSeq_version
variable.description: HTSeq version used

variable.name: BLAST_version
variable.description: Blast version used

variable.name: FastQC_version
variable.description: FastQC version used

variable.name: Samtools_version
variable.description: Samtools version used

variable.name: BLAST_TotalHits
variable.description: The number of reads out of 5000 randomly selected reads that map against the nt database using BLAST

variable.name: BLAST_HitsNotTarget_or_ERCC
variable.description: Percentage hits that map neither to the Human genome nor to ERCC sequences

variable.name: BLAST_Bacteria
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Bacteria

variable.name: BLAST_Fish
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Fish

variable.name: BLAST_Fly
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Fly

variable.name: BLAST_Human
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Human

variable.name: BLAST_Mouse
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Mouse

variable.name: BLAST_Rat
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Rat

variable.name: BLAST_Yeast
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to Yeast

variable.name: BLAST_HitsNotCounted
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to any other species

variable.name: BLAST_ERCC
variable.description: Number of BLAST matches to ERCC

variable.name: nTotalReadPairs
variable.description: Number of total reads from RNA-Sequencing

variable.name: nBothTrimmed
variable.description: Number of read pairs trimmed for contaminants

variable.name: nFirstTrimmed
variable.description: Number of reads trimmed for contaminants (First reads)

variable.name: nSecondTrimmed
variable.description: Number of reads trimmed for contaminants (Second reads)

variable.name: nBothDiscarded
variable.description: Number of read pairs discarded after trimming for being too short (< 20 nt)

variable.name: nFirstDiscarded
variable.description: Number of first reads discarded after trimming for being too short (< 20 nt)

variable.name: nSecondDiscarded
variable.description: Number of second reads discarded after trimming for being too short (< 20 nt)

variable.name: nBelowPhredThreshold(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads with Phred Score less than the threshold for at least one position

variable.name: nBelowPhredThreshold(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads with Phred Score less than the threshold for at least one position

variable.name: removed5N(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for Ns from 5' end

variable.name: removed5N(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for Ns from 5' end

variable.name: removed3N(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for Ns from 3' end

variable.name: removed3N(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for Ns from 3' end

variable.name: indexAdapter(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for the Index adapter

variable.name: indexAdapter(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for the Index adapter

variable.name: univAdapterRC(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for the reverse complement of the Universal adapter

variable.name: univAdapterRC(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for the reverse complement of the Universal adapter

variable.name: aRNAPrimer(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for the aRNA primer

variable.name: aRNAPrimer(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for the aRNA primer

variable.name: aRNAPrimerRC(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for the reverse complement of aRNA primer

variable.name: aRNAPrimerRC(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for the reverse complement of aRNA primer

variable.name: 5polyT(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for polyT from 5' end

variable.name: 5polyT(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for polyT from 5' end

variable.name: 3polyA(first)
variable.description: Number of first reads trimmed for polyA from 3' end

variable.name: 3polyA(second)
variable.description: Number of second reads trimmed for polyA from 3' end

variable.name: NexteraXT_TransposaseRC(first)
variable.description: Number of reads trimmed for 3' NexteraXT Transposase Reverse complement

variable.name: CDS(first)
variable.description: Number of reads trimmed for the CDS 3' Adapter

variable.name: CDS_RC(first)
variable.description: Number of reads trimmed for the CDS 3' Adapter Reverse complement

variable.name: nTSOFiltered(first)
variable.description: Number of reads filtered for being the TSO primer concatemers

variable.name: AvgInpReadLen
variable.description: Average read length

variable.name: AvgUniqMapLen
variable.description: Average read length for uniquely mapped reads

variable.name: UniqMap
variable.description: % Uniquely mapped reads by STAR aligner

variable.name: Multimapped
variable.description: % Multimapped reads by STAR aligner

variable.name: ReadsTooShort
variable.description: % Reads too short and not mapped as reported by STAR aligner

variable.name: ReadsCountedExonic
variable.description: Number of reads counted by HTSeq as exonic

variable.name: NumGenesExpressed
variable.description: Number of genes with at least one exonic read

variable.name: AvgReadPerGeneExonic
variable.description: Average number of reads that are exonic per gene

variable.name: MaxReadsPerGeneExonic
variable.description: Maximum number of reads that are exonic per gene

variable.name: NoExonicFeature
variable.description: Number of reads that did not map to any exon as reported by HTSeq

variable.name: AmbiguousMappedExonic
variable.description: Number of reads that mapped ambiguosly to exons of more than one gene and were not counted

variable.name: ReadsCountedIntronic
variable.description: Number of reads counted by HTSeq as intronic

variable.name: NumGenesWithIntronicExpression
variable.description: Number of genes with at least one intronic read

variable.name: AvgReadPerGeneIntronic
variable.description: Average number of reads that are intronic per gene

variable.name: MaxReadsPerGeneIntronic
variable.description: Maximum number of reads that are intronic per gene

variable.name: NoIntronicFeature
variable.description: Number of reads that did not map to any intron as reported by HTSeq

variable.name: AmbiguousMappedIntronic
variable.description: Number of reads that mapped ambiguosly to introns of more than one gene and were not counted
